solution: Remember to line up the decimal points. Add as you would add whole numbers. Remember to write the decimal point in the answer!
Add the tenths: 4 tenths + 5 tenths = 9 tenths.
Now add the ones: 6 + 0 = 6.
Now add the tens: 16 + 35 = 51. So, the total is 516.9
